article.h1: Introduction: the role of the Error and Correction Team

div.p: The Specialist Technical Team that Tax Administration, LitigationÂ and Advice (TALA) team is responsible for tax and duty assessment and error correction policies can be contacted for advice in cases of doubt or difficulty, see CH910000 Link: https://www.gov.uk/hmrc-internal-manuals/compliance-handbook/ch910000 . policies.
The team provides policy advice on

ul.li: provisions and processes to establish debts as recoverable.

div.p: The team does not provide policy advice on

ul.li: liability (refer to the Excise Holding & Movement team)
duty points (refer to the Excise Holding & Movement team)
use of guarantees (refer to the Excise Holding & Movement team)
interest, penalties, debt management (refer to the Penalties & Debt Management team), or
maintenance of operational systems (refer to the Excise Group Intranet Site).
